title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 628/87 of 27 February 1987 amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in China
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 628/87
of 27 February 1987
amending quantitative limits fixed for imports of certain textile products originating in China
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The quantitative limits for textile products originating in China, as fixed in Annex III to Regulation (EEC) No 2072/84, are hereby amended for 1987 as laid down in the Annex hereto.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 27 February 1987.
For the Commission
Willy DE CLERCQ
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 198, 27. 7. 1984, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 383, 31. 12. 1986, p. 20.
